news.title: OpenAI
news.summary: The updated content showcases OpenAI's diverse range of AI-powered tools and services, including ChatGPT, Sora, and API Platform, highlighting the company's commitment to making AI accessible and empowering for all. The presence of multilingual support and various AI-driven features demonstrates significant technical advances and notable business impact.

news.title: ChatGPT
news.summary: The introduction of ChatGPT, with its advanced AI capabilities and production-ready service, indicates significant technical innovation and major business impact, particularly in the areas of conversational AI and customer service automation.

news.title: Google DeepMind
news.summary: Google DeepMind has made significant advancements in their Gemini model, including scaled production readiness and achieving a gold-medal standard at the International Mathematical Olympiad, demonstrating notable technical innovation and moderate business impact.

news.title: Google DeepMind
news.summary: The update introduces Backstory, a new tool for exploring online image context, and marks the stable release of Gemini 2.5 Pro and Flash, indicating incremental improvements in Google DeepMind's AI capabilities.
